8/ I don't expect as severe a in # bitcoin's price & we haven't reached my definition of a $ BTC bubble, but these are things to be aware of

6/ After every bubble there's a crash In those 3 periods # bitcoin's drawdown: June 2011 peak to trough: -93% April 2013: -71% Nov 2013: -85%
5/ I define a # bitcoin bubble as a period where price doubles (or more) in a 30-day period. As $ BTC nears $3,800 we are up 70% in 30 days
